no_misleading_offers: No claims of guaranteed approval, unlimited rewards, risk-free investments.
no_clickbait: No urgent manipulative phrasing such as 'instant jackpot' or 'only 24 hours'.
glba_privacy: Do not include non-redacted personal financial information (account numbers, SSNs).
tcp_can_spam: Commercial messages must follow TCPA/CAN-SPAM rules; do not use predatory language or lack unsubscribe instructions.
